CustomField.description: US-0010555 - ADS - Validation skip on setting AD on Ad product for PVP
CustomField.formula: AND( !ISNULL(Product2__c), Ad_Id__c != '', OR( Product2__r.Callisto__c = false, AND( Product2__r.Callisto__c = true, ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.StageName, 'Closed Won') ) ) )
CustomField.label: IsInGamOrCallisto
